apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'kiss: man, no skin tone, man, medium skin tone' emoji presents two men in a tender embrace, one with a neutral skin tone and the other with a medium skin tone, leaning in for a kiss. Apple's signature realistic lighting and glossy 3D shading create a warm, intimate scene with soft, rounded forms. This emoji on Apple devices beautifully symbolizes romantic affection, same-sex relationships, and expressions of love between men, offering a heartfelt and inclusive representation.
